It's an amazing game normally I didn't know about it and my cousin really liked it so I gave it a shot. First when I was a noob I played so much custom game and even though I did improve, it was boring when I was a noob. So then I started watching Ayrun and I improved even more. At this point I liked the game so I didn't play it just for my cousin. I think when I got to like rank 8 or 9 something like that I took a very long break and lost my fellow rank. But now I am making a return to DBD. Even though right now my rank might be low I am still a very good player. I am currently working on improving my rank but mainly I play the game for fun not for rank. For me it's not the rank that shows how skilled that player is since I have seen rank 1 bots or fake red rank. Honestly, just play for fun.

remove dedicated servers, bring back ptp.

Edit: Uninstalled, got tired of getting hit through pallets.

I've had the game for about 6 days or so and I really like this game. Whether you play survivor or killer you definitely have some great fun. Getting into games isn't too bad, tons of characters and perks to customize your character the way you feel like. All the killers are unique and so are the survivors. I would recommend this game to people who like horrorish games and action with stealth. Playing survivor is always more fun with friends but some people don't like queuing with friends as they think it's unfun, yet you have still play killer well against a four stack. This game is definitely worth it!!!
Love this game. Is a lot of fun when playng with friends.
Melhor game ja inventado,era meu sonho e se tornou realidade !
Jogo muito bem projetado e divertido
Das spiel hat Super Grafik aber kein Voice Chat deswegen. 3/5 Sterne.
The sound of screams echo through out the land, ah what a beautiful melody!
It a very fun game to play with your friends

Needs ALOT of work in regards to balancing and finetuning hitboxes etc. and not to mention the hackers.
That being said it is a great game that if properly managed (currently not) could be contester for the best multiplayer horror experience on the market

This review is after more than 500hrs.

If you are buying this game.

1. Buy in sale.

2. Crazy hit boxes.

3. You can't change the servers as it's P2P. There no in-game voice chat by design. You are very dependent upon 
    your teammates to survive & vice-versa. 

4. I mainly play survivor, If you happened to be a killer (main). No matter, how good you play survivor will be very toxic to 
    you  in post-game chat.  Avoid indulging them.


5. If you have friends who play this game, you might enjoy the game a lot.

6. You may get tunnelled or camped. It's  annoying, Yes. Also it's a part of the game. Don't rage quit or DC. Your teammates 
    depend upon you.

7. Buy the base game, You can unlock most of the character by in-game money ( Shards ).
----------

Recommendation - 7/10    --   If you play with friends
Recommendation - 4/ 10   --   If You are playing solo

-------------
